thread.section_title: LanguageCourse.Net opiniones | Opiniones de clientes sobre LanguageCourse.Net | www.languagecourse.net
thread.title: Svetlana

author: Svetlana
title: Svetlana
text: My Spanish course in Tenerife was something to remember. I had small group and we became friends for life. Teacher was very good and we had some fun learning Spanish. School is in the heart of capital and easy to find. We traveled around the island after school because bus service very affordable and easy to travel on.Communication from course team was excellent.Value for money and I will recommend.
